html:
10.15.17  8:04 pm   can anyone truly be free?

     thanks bob, for such a great question. yes, even You can be free, as well as your friends, neighbours, and the folks at home

10.15.17  8:01 pm   What do you think about the whole 'tension and release' thing for writing harmonies?

     i think those terms are possibly too nebulous be anywhere near as helpful as listening to the actual sound of the harmonies you are using, or considering using

     (Maybe it's used in reference to melody/rhythm too, but I usually hear it in reference to harmony). I know you say that the 'best' chord is the one that best supports the melody, but any melody can be harmonized in like a billion different ways, each giving its own unique character to the melody. When you're writing a song do you consciously think about dissonance & consonance or tension & release?

     i listen to the way the music sounds

     For me, I kind of base it off the lyrics and/or how the melody makes me feel. Do you think the whole tension/release thing is more just like a metaphor to describe the function of harmony in a song?

     if you are looking for something that you couldn't already hear from listening the music, i don't think you're going to find it

     Or is it like a tool, or a lense you can look through when writing?

     the only lense i look through is the way the music sounds, including all the words and their sounds and the way the whole thing sounds together with the music. there might be other lenses but i don't use them

10.15.17  7:33 pm   this website is violating the NAP how do you feel

     i don't think it does. although your question might violate it, i'm not sure

10.15.17  7:27 pm   Do you think the 'na na na na na na na hey jude' part in hey jude goes on for too long?

     i don't know how long it goes on

     a mid-afternoon errand

     keep reading this page, or also other pages of this site

10.15.17  5:28 pm   What are antioxidants? 

     i'm not sure but i don't think it's oxygen

10.15.17  5:15 pm   have you ever considered releasing an album?

     i think i prefer to release the songs individually. it seems to be more fun, and makes sense for the century i am living in

10.15.17  5:14 pm   what happened to the reality page? "oh no what happened to my punk tutu" appears instead of a video 

     i've never had that problem, and i tested it and it worked fine. maybe you can screen shot it so i can see what it's trying to get at in the URL? i made a slight adjustment that might have fixed it but let me know

10.15.17  5:05 pm   Will I ever be able to make stuff that looks as good when it's made as it did when I first imagined it?

     no, but it will be as good as people think you imagined it. which they will think is very good, and they will wonder how you managed to imagine it so good

     yes

     earth

     the world

     give it to a friend, or loved one

     i suppose it can be but i have never used it that way

10.15.17  2:18 pm   why do baseball fans sing take me out to the ballgame when they are already at the ballgame?

     because that way it feels like their wish is being fulfilled instantly

     i

10.15.17  1:54 pm   On the lyrics for outside why does (it) have parentheses around it?

     because i may have barely or not even physically said it, but it is written there because otherwise it might mean something slightly different

     you

10.15.17  8:55 am   Recently I've been rejected by a girl I like.
I am not sure how to cope with my feelings, I feel depressed, somewhat angry, I wish I can still be friends with her, but I also feel insecure and somewhat betrayed by her.
I know all of this sounds childish and all, but I am really inexperienced in relationships.
Can you please give me some advice?

     ride some roller coasters

10.15.17  8:29 am   When are you going to upload a new video?

     when it is done

10.15.17  5:55 am   Should I work for myself or others?  Should I make others happy before myself because that hasn't been going well :((

     try a little of both

10.15.17  5:31 am   help, a girl is attracted to me\

     i will try to help

10.15.17  5:26 am   What is the airplane mode function for?

     turning off all communications to and from your phone, which may or may not be necessary when traveling on an airplane, as a passenger

10.15.17  3:57 am   Am I a cat

     i don't think so

10.15.17  3:48 am   hey bill this is just a suggestion but i think you could make a system like posting short videos (like the 10 seconds ones) in between longer videos to make the wait on longer videos bearable and to also make your work more chill and not time chasing. but that's just a suggestion n idk your circumstances, so you live the way you'd like to live your life

     i have already done way way way too many videos of that length, and it doesn't please the audience either, becsuse they take it as a message that i'm not doing anything longer. as a compromise i will be doing reasonable sized videos on a reasonable schedule

     maybe

10.14.17  5:51 pm   so I sometimes split music up between "virtuosic music" and "communal music" where virtuosic music requires rigorous study in order to sound good on, and communal music has a focus on being as easy as possible so everyone can join in. I don't think that young musicians get exposed to the communal styles of music as often, where jazz and classical music is in most middle schools and high schools in the us. I mean, you could probably get some of the communal music in some churches, but lots of people don't go to church.

     what about just turning on the radio, or going into stores

10.14.17  5:01 pm   how do you do life?

     try a way that no one has tried before

10.14.17  4:24 pm   Favorite sandwich?  

     the truth

10.14.17  4:11 pm   Whatâ€™s the point of Patreon when itâ€™s paypal donations but every month. Whereâ€™s the shitty drawings we get for donating our life savings?

     no one has to donate anything they dont want to. i have them both because some people are more comfortable with one, and some people may be more comfortable with the other. one is one time, the other is recurring. there are others that people may be comfortable which i haven't gotten around to adding yet, such as venmo and bitcoin, which i have received many requests to add, and i will add. both the existing methods were also added by popular request. i'm not sure if that answers your question
